keyFacts: The email requests detailed staffing information for the MCC on August 9-10, 2019, specifically asking to distinguish between mandated and voluntary overtime.
On August 9, 2019 (4pm-12am), there were 21 posts, 20 staff present, and 6 overtime shifts.
On August 10, 2019 (12am-8am), there were 19 posts, 18 staff present, and 10 overtime shifts.
The inquiry was sent on August 13, 2019, with a deadline of noon the following day, indicating urgency.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting it relates to the period around Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death at the MCC in August 2019.
